(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (While 
          (Do) 
          (Arg 
            (Primary 
              (Lhs 
                (Variable 
                  (Identifier "foo"))))))))) 
  (Statement 
    (WhileModifier 
      (Statement 
        (Arg 
          (Primary 
            (Lhs 
              (Variable 
                (Identifier "foo")))))) 
      (Arg 
        (Primary 
          (Lhs 
            (Variable 
              (Identifier "run"))))))))
